ygData.subject: Re: quest question
ygData.msgSnippet: It works for me everytime, except for the Aviak merchant in South Karana. It doesn t work on him because those Aviaks at SK have NO faction.  As for the
ygData.messageBody:
It works for me everytime, except for the Aviak merchant in South Karana.
It doesn't work on him because those Aviaks at SK have NO faction. As for
the merchant in Oasis, are you talking about the gypsies? Or the one in the
inns? I think they both have faction, maybe you were on the botherline of
dubious and threathening. So after you play the song, you are still on
dubious but almost apprehensive. If you make it to apprehensive, they will
sell to you. But if all else fail, just sneak up to him and buy/sell. Sneak
will make every merchant indifferent to you. Every rogue knows this trick!

>How are you people using the charismatic carillion? I have never had it do
>anything for me. After reading all these messages I thought maybe it had
>been fixed, so I tried it on a merchant in Oasis of Mar who conned dubious
>and refused to sell to me. I equipped my mino horn, targeted the merchant,
>played the carillion, and conned her again. Still dubious. Right clicked
>her, she still refused to sell to me.
>
>I am level 35 with wind skill either maxed out or close to it.
>
> - Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
>
